column4: i'll let you answer if you tell me what indicator-apple is :3
I didn't want to answer anyway.  And ummmmmmm, it tells you some sort of indication?  Heck if I know.  it's an indicator applet but what it is indicating is beyond me
indicator-applet is being run by conky. i see now.

Yea, only thing I could find from my google-fu was that it is an applet to indicate stuffs and things.  used by like pidgin and email programs and such.   And that some people reported that it tried to eat existance on their system
